Looking at different forecasting methods with the prescriptive data created in section ~ 2 Testing prescriptive models

```{r load and plot central tendency}
OwnWaste <- read.csv("prescriptive data/Final_Country_Waste_Analysis copy.csv", header=TRUE)
  select(Country, Year, Processed_Own_Waste)
  rename(
    Qty = Processed_Own_Waste
  ) %>%
  group_by(Year) %>%
  mutate(Qty = Qty * 1e9) %>% # from 1 Million Tonnes to Kg
  summarise(
    Qty = sum(Qty, na.rm = TRUE),
  ) %>%
  as_tsibble(index = Year)

# Display the first few rows
head(OwnWaste)

```
